projects.name: Emitly
projects.description: Emitly is a beautifully designed chat app that makes connecting with others effortless. With features like friends, contacts, and more, it offers everything you need for a smooth and engaging chatting experience. Best of all, Emitly works entirely in your browser — no downloads or installations required.

projects.name: VeyzenClient
projects.description: VeyzenClient is a sleek, modern, open-source Minecraft 1.8.9 Forge-based client currently in development. Designed for performance, stability, and customization, it enhances your gameplay experience while staying lightweight and user-friendly.

projects.name: Fatigue+
projects.description: Fatigue+ is a lightweight, immersive Minecraft mod that simulates sleep deprivation. Designed for Minecraft 1.8.9 (Forge) and built to work client-side only, this mod tracks how long you’ve stayed awake and progressively makes your experience more difficult.
